phase7_import_log.description: Crafty Syntax 3.7.5 livehelp_ tables imported from lupopedia.com/lh into Lupopedia database for Phase 7 validation. Environment #1 (Local): phpMyAdmin confirms tables present; no errors; no schema drift; table count 173; doctrine 100%.
